amendatorysection.catchline: Discovery of property of debtor; examination; witnesses.
amendatorysection.para: Witnesses may be required, upon the order of the judge or by a subpoena issued by the clerk of the court, to appear and testify upon any proceedings under sections 25-1564 to 25-1580 in the same manner as upon the trial of an issue.

annotation.para: Witnesses may be required to appear and testify in the same manner as upon the trial of an issue. Orchard & Wilhelm Co. v. North, 125 Neb. 723, 251 N.W. 895 (1933).
